app.name: SongDrive
app.summary: Store, manage, synchronize and present songs and setlists

features.description: Build your song collection using a simple song syntax and create setlists with realtime search and filters.
features.title: Minimal effort

features.description: Perform the songs of your setlist using your tablet or laptop on stage as well as presenting them to the audience at the same time.
features.title: Ready for stage

features.description: Transpose songs with a single click, create PDF song sheets, export songs and setlists in multiple formats, hotkey support and more.
features.title: Tools for artists

error.emailNotChanged: You entered your current email address.
error.requiredJsonFormat: The file must be in JSON format.
error.setlistAlreadyExists: A setlist with this title already exists on this date. Please change either the title or the date.
error.songAlreadyExists: A song with this title already exists in this language. Please change either the title or the language.
error.wrongPassword: The password you provided is wrong. Typo?

placeholder.exampleSongAuthors: e.g.  Edwin Othello Excell | John Newton
placeholder.exampleSongContent:
song text with chords and markers, e.g.:

--v
  G          C  
This is the verse text
 D        G  
Just an example text

--c
  D           C  
This is the chorus text
 D        C      G  
Just an example text

--b
  Em  
This is the bridge text
 C        D  
Just an example text
placeholder.searchSongTitle: Search for Song title, subtitle and full text

text.changeToAnotherEmail: Change to another email address. Keep in mind, that this is also your username.
text.confirmationBody:
Hi {0},

You were approved to use SongDrive just now. You can now log in under {1}

If you have any questions, please contact us!

Your SongDrive-Team
text.confirmWithAdminPassword: To confirm please enter your admin password
text.confirmWithCurrentPassword: To confirm please enter your current password
text.deleteYourAccount: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. Please be certain.
text.doTheImport: Do the import by processing all datasets in selected file
text.importAndOverwrite: Import data collections and overwrite current data.
text.languageInUse: There are still songs assigned to this language. Please remove or reassign those before deleting this language.
text.manageTags: Manage all song tags (click to edit)
text.noSetlistsAvailableSignedIn: There are currently no setlists available. Add setlists to see them here or import backup or demo data.
text.noSetlistsAvailableSignedOut: There are currently no setlists available. Sign in to add setlists or import data from backups or demo database.
text.noSongsAvailableSignedIn: There are currently no songs available. Add songs to see them here or import backup or demo data.
text.noSongsAvailableSignedOut: There are currently no songs available. Sign in to add songs or import data from backups or demo database.
text.notApprovedYet: Your user account has not been approved yet. You will be notified as soon as you've been granted access to SongDrive by an administrator.
text.noTranslations: This song has no translation yet.
text.notVerifiedYet: Your email address has not been verified yet. Please click the link in the verification email that was sent to you when registering to get access to SongDrive.
text.reallyDeleteAccount: Are you sure you want to delete your user account? All your personal data will be gone. The songs and setlists you created, will be kept.
text.reallyDeleteLanguage: Do you really want to delete the Language «{name}» ?
text.reallyDeleteSetlist: Do you really want to delete the Setlist «{title}» ?
text.reallyDeleteSong: Do you really want to delete the Song «{title}» ?
text.reallyDeleteUser: Do you really want to delete the User «{name}» ?
text.renewYourPassword: Renew your password. It must be at least 8 characters long.
text.saveAll: Save all data collections in JSON format.
text.selectSomeSongs: Select some songs for this setlist
text.selectSomeTags: Select some tags for the current song
text.selectSomeTranslations: Select all songs that are a translation to the current song
text.selectJsonFile: Select a file in JSON format containing SongDrive data collections
text.selectUserForTransfer: Please select a user, to transfer the created content from {name} to.
text.sendPasswordResetEmail: Enter your user account's verified email address and you will get a password reset link.
text.signInForAccess: Please sign in with your user account to access this page.
text.unconfirmedMistake: If you think this is a mistake, please contact us.
text.unverifiedHelp: If you need help to get access to SongDrive, please contact us.

title.noYear: No year available for this song

toast.databaseExportedText: The whole database was successfully exported in JSON format.
toast.exportedSetlistPdfText: The setlist was successfully exported as PDF file.
toast.exportedSongPdfText: The song was successfully exported in PDF format.
toast.exportedSongSngText: The song was successfully exported in SNG format.
toast.exportedSongTextText: The song was successfully exported in plain text format.
toast.passwordWrongText: Maybe a Typo? Please enter your current password correctly.
toast.passwordResetSentText: Please click the link that was sent to your SongDrive email address to reset your password.
toast.setlistFormatCopiedText: Setlist in {format} format was successfully copied.
toast.setlistStatusSavedText: The setlist status was successfully saved.
toast.signedOutText: Be blessed and have a nice day!
toast.signedUpText: Thank you for registering, {name}! You can start using SongDrive, as soon as you got approved by an admin.
toast.songDeletedFromSetlist: The song was removed from this setlist.
toast.userAddedText: The new user was successfully created and verification email was sent.
toast.verficationSentText: Please click the link that was sent to your email address to verify it.

tooltip.verificationAlreadySent: A verification email was already sent.
